article_title: Figaro, Figaro, Figaro! Milwaukee native Emily Fons embraces her feminine side in 'Barber of Seville'
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Cloudy skies during the morning hours followed by scattered showers and thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 79F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms during the evening followed by a few showers overnight. Low 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , madison opera, emily fons, rossini, barber of seville, overture hall
article_metadata.author: Lindsay Christians | The Capital Times

og.description: This weekend Fons makes her role debut as Rosina, the young ingenue at the center of Madison Opera's production.
